publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 20
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa miźmoru David́niń. Qaruv b́ergej H saja tar ḱuńd́a kipĺagej śeni Teńrisi Jaʿaqovnun.
Ij- ge bolušluɣujnu qodeš́t́ań da Cijjondan kipĺagej śeni.
Saɣyngej bar tirkiĺarijni da ʿolalaryjny ḱuĺ et́kej hamḿeš́a.

B́ergej saja ḱoĺńuja ḱoŕa
da bar keńaš́ĺarijni t́uǵaĺ et́kej.
Sarnejbyz jarlyɣašyj byla da š́emi byla Teńrimiźniń laqablangejbyz tolturgej H bar kĺakĺarijni.
Haĺegińa bi- ĺamiń ki jarlyɣašlar H śurt́uĺḿuš́uń qaruv b́erir anar aziź ḱok- ĺarińd́ań baɣatyrlyɣy byla jarlyɣašynyn on qudratynyn.
Bular atlar byla da bular markav byla da biź anyn š́emiń H Teńrimiźniń saɣyndyryrbyz.
Alar č́okkejĺar da jyɣylgejlar da biź turarbyz da kipĺanirbiź.
H jarlyɣaš- lagej ol Bij qaruv b́ergej biźǵa čaɣyrɣan ḱuńuḿuźd́a.
